entry.title: How to Fix Shields.io Badges Not Displaying in Jenkins
entry.summary: If your Shields.io badges (like build status or documentation status) arenâ€™t showing up in your Jenkins dashboard, itâ€™s likely due to Jenkins' strict Content Security Policy (CSP). In this post, Iâ€™ll show you how to temporarily fix it using the Script Console and make the change permanent by modifying Jenkins startup options. Safe for internal Jenkins setups and tested on modern Jenkins installations.

entry.title: How to Change abortPrevious Value in Jenkins?
entry.summary: In Jenkins, the `disableConcurrentBuilds` option is used to manage concurrent builds. This article explains how to conditionally set the `abortPrevious` value based on the branch being built, allowing for more flexible build management.
